name: the HER I was told I needed
name_original: the HER I was told I needed
description:
They say that when one reaches a certain point, they are enter a maze in which they are meant to find HER. No one talks about HER, the only thing they keep saying is "ONE MUST FIND HER TO ACHIEVE TRUE HAPPINESS". 

Will you be able to find it? Do you even want it in the first place? 

Controls: 

MOVE - WASD/Arrows

TALK/INTERACT - SPACE 

CHOOSE - ENTER
